name: 3dDespike
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
AFNI 3dDespike, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.afni.preprocess, interface: Despike).
Removes 'spikes' from the 3D+time input dataset
For complete details, see the `3dDespike Documentation. <https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dDespike.html>`_
